website_summaries.verdict: For experienced Jenga players who want to take game play up a notch or two. Friction between blocks and height do become factors, but many players will enjoy the added challenge.
pros: Larger blocks improve game play for adult users
Suitable for players of all ages and motor skill levels
cons: Inferior counterfeit or generic products reported
Finish on blocks not completely smooth

customer_reviews.title: Fun, great for groups or solo
customer_reviews.text: Just like original Jenga but way bigger. Just as fun. Can play inside or outside -all you need is a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had fun playing with the family over the weekend. Size is great for outdoor play... big enough to get some serious height, but not too large that hurts too bad if it falls on you (although might sting a little)... everyone had a great time... from old to young. Was a bit pricey though. Would I recommend: Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Has already been through multiple round of play. Don't settle for an imitation
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: This isn't Giant or even big!!!
customer_reviews.text: So so disappointed in the size of this. Bought for my Sons and daughters family thinking it was 4ft tall!!!! Just way to expensive for what it is. I'm retired and on a fixed income but wanted to do something nice for my kids and their families during this tuff time ... they think I'm crazy for spending so much for what it is... so sad
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyK

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday family activities and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting this giant Jenga game for a while. I was not disappointed when it arrived. It has been the source of fun @numerous family gatherings. I now keep it in my trunk just in case we go someplace and they would like to play it! The only thing keeping it from five stars is the ease of setup and box. I should have bought the optional carrying case. The unit does not come with a cardboard piece like the smaller version. This would help with setting up the game in its starting form.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Correa

customer_reviews.title: Not a GIANT Jenga!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t what I expected, even after reading the dimensions. It’s about 2 feet high to start and the individual wooden pieces are only 6 inches long. Very disappointng, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two strikes
customer_reviews.text: Here's another one I purchased before I found the right size. Again, the GIANT term in the description is misleading. I guess it's giant compared to the regular JENGA but it's not the giant size I was looking for (about the size of your average brick.) So I returned this set to find the bigger set (which I did eventually find by Go Sports.) Other than not being as large as I had hoped, this is a fine set.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Kriebel

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Our family and friends love this game. Because of its size and the simplicity of the goals, it is fun to play. There is no need for anything other than steady hands and laughter. Good for all ages both indoors and outdoors. The game pieces are well made and smooth to the touch and the box provides a great storage function
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jenga for All!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Giant Jenga! It’s a gift the entire family can enjoy no matter the age!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks! We enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: The wood is pretty sturdy and thick. I don't think it goes up to 4 feet tall unless you start the building on the actual Jenga box. It is fun and better than playing with the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My boys take this on trips, over to friends' houses. Wood is well finished.
customer_reviews.author: Midland6

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what it sounds like, an 8x as large version of Jenga
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it sounds like, an 8x as large version of Jenga. Yes it's pricey but you're paying to have smooth blocks to use for your game. The knockoff versions are all very rough and make it much harder to actually build a giant tower. Be sure to buy the booster pack that's available, the game should have included it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Buy the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Great family fun great quality. My husband demanded the name brand as he read that each piece is a bit different and he is right. We have used the cut lumber knock offs and there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: For the price I expected bigger. This is not ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected bigger. This is not what I had thought it would be. It was small even sitting on a card table for our outside BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hit with the In-Laws
customer_reviews.text: For a game playing family this was a hit for the holidays. Even as the weather outside is frightful we played this game for hours after dinner and it was packed in there RV for fun on the road with new friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Large but not GIANT
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks but not "GIANT". I thought they would be the 10.5" blocks that I see but they are only 7" which I did not see labelled anywhere so it's a little misleading. Other than that, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, Giant is an overstatement.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice extra large jenga set. Considering the Giant jenga sets people make and that you may have seen in bars, this is considerably smaller. It think "Giant" was an overstatement. Otherwise, it is really fun to play and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Jenga baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: I play this with my daughter all the time. We love it!

customer_reviews.title: No carry case
customer_reviews.text: Smaller blocks and no carry case make this difficult to store and play

customer_reviews.title: Giant Jenga Hardwood Game
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game. I purchased this for my son, his wife and their newly adopted 11 yr. old son. The LOVE it because it is a great family game to share time together.

customer_reviews.title: Big fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game! We have it on the table when we have friends over, and before you know it everyone is gathering around the table to watch the game go down!

customer_reviews.title: Gift for fun and laughter
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my cousin with a large family. I brought my giant Jenga to a family party and they absolutely lived it, we had so much fun and so much laughter. I decided to buy one as a gift for them.

customer_reviews.title: We love it and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: After looking at all of the options out there on a large jenga game, we decided to go with this one. We love it and lots of fun. The blocks are smooth and of high quality. Box is great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C

customer_reviews.title: MEGA JENGA MADINESS! What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: Best Jenga size ever! It's awesome for company picnic. Everyone with a backyard should have a set of these.

customer_reviews.title: FUN!

customer_reviews.title: The large Jenga pieces are lots of fun. The large pieces make it easier for adults ...
customer_reviews.text: The large Jenga pieces are lots of fun. The large pieces make it easier for adults to play and makes the game more challenging as the stack gets higher. We have used it for Sunday school by writing questions or verses from the Bible on tape applied to the blocks. Team members have to answer the question or give the location of the verse on the block their member pulled. Correct answers allows the player to sit down and the other team's player is up; incorrect answers means the team player has to keep pulling and stacking blocks until the team gives a correct response.

customer_reviews.text: This is not really "giant," and would be more appropriately named "mid-size Jenga." The quality is great though.

customer_reviews.title: Great game for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: This game was a huge hit at the wedding! Kids and adults played with it all night long. I would definitely suggest getting a table or something to lift the game a little higher off the ground. We put it on a wooden crate to create a more dramatic fall at the end of the game. We debated about purchasing the "bonus blocks" that are commonly purchased alongside this game. I feel like the wooden crate created enough height for the game and the extra blocks may have been a little much if we had purchased them. Especially due to the amount of small children that were playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Reads

customer_reviews.title: It's just like the original Jenga
customer_reviews.text: We would always play Jenga growing up as kids, so when I saw they came out with a Jenga Giant, I had to buy it. It's just like the original Jenga, but even better! The wood blocks are huge and great quality, and it really does stack high when the game gets going (we even bought the booster pack which makes it grow to over five feet!!). Really fast shipping and a great classic game gives this rating five stars!

product_meta.title: Jenga GIANT Genuine Hardwood Game (Stacks to 4+ feet. Ages 8+)
product_meta.description: This version of Jenga Giant can stack to over 4 feet high in play (and over 5 feet high with the Jenga Giant Genuine hardwood booster pack sold separately), and it's still portable! You can take it to the beach, your favorite hangout, and everywhere else you go. It's perfect for backyard BBQs, celebrations and parties, and anywhere people gather together to have fun. Jenga Giant. Now it's a party! If you want an even bigger Jenga experience, check out Jenga Giant JS7 hardwood game which can build to over 5 feet high in play! An entertainment highlight at events, fundraisers, and parties. Please note: this is not one of those DIY stacking games with 10.5" blocks seen in some bars and other venues. Those larger games are made from softwood "2x4's" that do not provide the playability, durability, and safety of our authentic Jenga Giant games.
feature_bullets: The classic Jenga game, but MUCH BIGGER!

At setup, starts at nearly 22 inches high, and can stack to over 4 feet high in play! Blocks are over 8 times the size of original Jenga blocks. ** Can stack over 5 feet high with Jenga GIANT Genuine Booster Pack sold separately **
54 Over-Sized, Precision Cut, High Quality, Polished Genuine Hardwood Blocks
Sturdy box for easy storage and transport
Ages: 8 to Adult / 1 or more players
Now it's a SPORT! Fun to Play! Exciting to Watch!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars240 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
